1370: Ghodelde was born in Marcktgang in 1370.
Got married to Siccone at age 18 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Ghodelde in 1371 at age 19.
1372: Gave birth to Dammas in 1372 at age 20.
1374: Gave birth to Lelien in 1374 at age 22.
1376: Gave birth to Sipper in 1376 at age 24.
1377: Gave birth to Wolbrand in 1377 at age 25.
1382: Gave birth to Harlo in 1382 at age 30.
1383: Lost son Harlo when Harlo was 2 years old.
1385: Gave birth to Sara in 1385 at age 33.
1387: Lost son Wolbrand when Wolbrand was 11 years old.
1388: Gave birth to Richolfus in 1388 at age 36.
1389: Gave birth to Hodine in 1389 at age 37.
Lost daughter Lelien when Lelien was 16 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1391: Lost daughter Sipper when Sipper was 16 years old.
1395: Lost daughter Ghodelde when Ghodelde was 25 years old.
